byooption.longDescription: Purchase this BMW Ultimate Care upgrade to add: *Replacement of specific wear-and-tear items such as brake pads, wiper blades and manual transmission clutch (for model year 2017 vehicles and newer). * Ultimate Care+ is transferable to a subsequent owner, should you sell your vehicle.  Price - $600 across the board for all 2017 model/series.  Legal Disclaimer:  Visit bmwusa.com/ultimatecare for details. For model year 2015 or later vehicles sold or leased by an authorized BMW Center on or after July 1, 2014, BMW Ultimate Care coverage is not transferable to subsequent purchasers, owners, or lessees. Please see bmwusa.com/ultimatecare or ask your authorized BMW Center for details.  Certain restrictions apply when purchasing coverage once your previous coverage period has ended. Limitations or additional fees may apply.

byooption.disclaimer:
BMW Ultimate Care+ and BMW Ultimate Care+1 Bundle

Purchase BMW Ultimate Care+ to add:

▪ Replacement of specific wear-and-tear items such as brake pads, wiper blades and manual transmission clutch (for model
year 2017 vehicles and newer).

▪ Ultimate Care+ is transferable to a subsequent owner, should you sell your vehicle.

With purchasing this bundle, you will also extend your coverage with BMW Ultimate Care+1 for an additional 1 year or 14,000 miles for a total of 4 years or 50,000 miles.


Price: BMW UC+ $600 + BMW UC+1 price (which differs per 2017 model/series)
See attached price sheet


Legal Disclaimer:

Visit bmwusa.com/ultimatecare for details. For model year 2015 or later vehicles sold or leased by an authorized BMW Center on or after July 1, 2014, BMW Ultimate Care coverage is not transferable to subsequent purchasers, owners, or lessees. Please see bmwusa.com/ultimatecare or ask your authorized BMW Center for details.

Certain restrictions apply when purchasing coverage once your previous coverage period has ended. Limitations or additional fees may apply.

byooption.disclaimer: Each price is the suggested retail price and is subject to change. Price excludes installation and taxes.
byooption.longDescription: The BMW iPad Holder is an attractive way to facilitate the use of an iPad in the vehicle. It provides a secure way to utilize these devices while in the rear seat of your BMW. This product is used in conjunction with our sturdy base carrier, which utilizes a modular plug connector. The holder can be easily clipped into the frame of the holder, which rotates 360° (optimal for watching films, viewing photos, composing e-mails, Facebook, Twitter, etc). Not for vehicles equipped with optional factory rear seat entertainment or optional sport seats.
byooption.name: BMW iPad Holder

accessories.description: The BMW iPad Holder is an attractive way to facilitate the use of an iPad in the vehicle. byoConfiguration.leaseOfferDisclaimer:
Offer not valid in Puerto Rico. Lease financing available on new 2018 BMW M760i xDrive Sedan models from participating BMW Centers through BMW Financial Services through July 31, 2017, to eligible, qualified customers with excellent credit history who meet BMW Financial Services' credit requirements.

Monthly lease payments of $2,179 per month for 36 months is based on an adjusted capitalized cost of $155,285 (MSRP of $161,095, including destination and handling fee of $995 and $1,700 estimated gas guzzler tax, less $5,500 customer down, $0 security deposit and suggested dealer contribution of $310).  Actual MSRP may vary.  Dealer contribution may vary and could affect your actual lease payment.  Cash due at signing includes $5,500 down payment, $2,179 first month's payment, $925 acquisition fee and $0 security deposit.  Lessee responsible for insurance during the lease term, excess wear and tear as defined in the lease contract, $0.25/mile over 22,500 miles and a disposition fee of $350 at lease end.  Not all customers will qualify for security deposit waiver.  Tax, title, license and registration fees are additional fees due at signing.  Advertised payment does not include applicable taxes.  Purchase option at lease end, excluding tax, title and government fees, is $90,213.

Offer valid through July 31, 2017 and may be combined with other offers unless otherwise stated.  Models pictured may be shown with metallic paint and/or additional accessories.  Visit your authorized BMW Center for important details.

©2017 BMW of North America, LLC. The BMW name, model names and logo are registered trademarks.

byooption.longDescription: As a dramatic aesthetic innovation, the Panoramic Sky Lounge LED Roof enhances the generous dimensions of the new 7 Series’ standard dual-panel Panoramic moonroof while adding a subtly elegant LED light pattern. This lighting is selectable in a choice of six colors via iDrive: white, blue, orange, bronze, lilac and green.\n
byooption.name: Panoramic Sky Lounge LED Roof

options.description: As a dramatic aesthetic innovation, the Panoramic Sky Lounge LED Roof enhances the generous dimensions of the new 7 Series’ standard dual-panel Panoramic moonroof while adding a subtly elegant LED light pattern. byooption.longDescription: A system of ionization and scents, controllable in three stages via iDrive or a dedicated button on the climate-control panel. Scents are drawn from cartridges; easily installed in the glove compartment. Cartridges are available in a selection of several fragrances: Blue Suite (fresh-water scents), Green Suite (fresh-plant scents), Golden Suite (warm and rich scents) and Authentic Suite (natural vehicle scent).
byooption.name: Ambient Air Package

byooption.longDescription: NOTE:  Please be advised these wheels come with low profile tires, which reduce comfort and cushioning between the wheel and road.  This can lead to increased risk of rim, tire, and suspension damage when driving over damaged road surfaces such as potholes.
byooption.name: 20" M Light alloy Double-Spoke wheels with performance non run-flat tires

byooption.longDescription: Remote Control Parking flawlessly parks you in tight spots. With a simple touch of the Display Key, the 7 Series will pull itself in and out of parking spots. While parking it brakes for pedestrians and other vehicles, keeping everyone safe and eliminating the possibility of scratches.
byooption.name: Remote Control Parking

options.description: Remote Control Parking flawlessly parks you in tight spots. With a simple touch of the Display Key, the 7 Series will pull itself in and out of parking spots. While parking it brakes for pedestrians and other vehicles, keeping everyone safe and eliminating the possibility of scratches.
options.name: Remote Control Parking

byooption.disclaimer: Under optimal road conditions.  Night vision performance is also limited by rain, fog, humidity and other weather conditions.
byooption.longDescription: Night Vision uses state-of-the-art infrared technology combined with black-and-white imaging to see things before they are visible to the naked eye.  Using a thermal imaging camera mounted in the lower air dam, Night Vision recognizes people, animals, and objects based upon the heat they emit. The warmer the object, the brighter it illuminates on the iDrive display monitor.  The Pedestrian Detection feature recognizes and indicates individual pedestrians on or near the roadway at a range up to 330 feet. The system only works during night hours, and it must be cooler than 95-degrees Fahrenheit.
byooption.name: Night Vision with Pedestrian Detection

options.description: Night Vision uses state-of-the-art infrared technology combined with black-and-white imaging to see things before they are visible to the naked eye.  Using a thermal imaging camera mounted in the lower air dam, Night Vision recognizes people, animals, and objects based upon the heat they emit. The warmer the object, the brighter it illuminates on the iDrive display monitor.  The Pedestrian Detection feature recognizes and indicates individual pedestrians on or near the roadway at a range up to 330 feet. The system only works during night hours, and it must be cooler than 95-degrees Fahrenheit.
options.disclaimer: Under optimal road conditions.  Night vision performance is also limited by rain, fog, humidity and other weather conditions.
options.name: Night Vision with Pedestrian Detection

byooption.longDescription: Driving should not be a contact sport. The many active safety features of Driver Assistance Plus help make you aware of pedestrians and other vehicles around you, while keeping you apprised of the local speed limit.
byooption.name: Driving Assistance Plus Package

packages.description: Driving should not be a contact sport. The many active safety features of Driver Assistance Plus help make you aware of pedestrians and other vehicles around you, while keeping you apprised of the local speed limit.
packages.name: Driving Assistance Plus Package

byooption.longDescription: Active Cruise Control with Stop & Go maintains your selected speed; it also uses radar to keep your preselected distance from the vehicle ahead and bring your vehicle to a complete stop, if needed - a useful feature in stop-and-go traffic. Also included is Collision Mitigation: if the vehicle ahead suddenly brakes, you are alerted and, if necessary, the brakes quickly engage.  \n\nActive Driving Assistant is comprised of 4 active safety features: Lane Departure Warning, Frontal Collision Warning, City Collision Mitigation, and Pedestrian Protection. These camera- and radar-based systems help prevent or reduce the severity of pedestrian and automotive collisions by using a combination of driver alerts and automatically priming and/or activating the brakes.
byooption.name: Active Driving Assistant Plus

options.description: Active Cruise Control with Stop & Go maintains your selected speed; it also uses radar to keep your preselected distance from the vehicle ahead and bring your vehicle to a complete stop, if needed - a useful feature in stop-and-go traffic. Also included is Collision Mitigation: if the vehicle ahead suddenly brakes, you are alerted and, if necessary, the brakes quickly engage.  \n\nActive Driving Assistant is comprised of 4 active safety features: Lane Departure Warning, Frontal Collision Warning, City Collision Mitigation, and Pedestrian Protection. These camera- and radar-based systems help prevent or reduce the severity of pedestrian and automotive collisions by using a combination of driver alerts and automatically priming and/or activating the brakes.
options.name: Active Driving Assistant Plus

byooption.longDescription: Traffic Jam Assistant is a semi-automated driving feature that provides comfort-enhancing steering assistance whenever the driver has at least one hand on the steering wheel.  When the assistant is activated, you will not be required to make potentially tiring, small, incremental steering adjustments while sitting in slow traffic.
byooption.name: Traffic Jam Assistant

options.description: Traffic Jam Assistant is a semi-automated driving feature that provides comfort-enhancing steering assistance whenever the driver has at least one hand on the steering wheel.  When the assistant is activated, you will not be required to make potentially tiring, small, incremental steering adjustments while sitting in slow traffic.
options.name: Traffic Jam Assistant

byooption.longDescription: This function actively keeps the vehicle in the center of the lane by providing active steering input when the vehicle starts to drift off-course. If a vehicle beside yours starts to veer too close, Side Collision Prevention's steering input will tug you away from a potential side collision.
byooption.name: Active Lane Keeping Assistant w/ side collision avoidance

byooption.longDescription: BMW Individual Composition takes your BMW to the next level of personal expression, with rich iridescent paints, supple leather upholstery and exclusive interior trims. Premium interior and exterior touches enhance the luxurious ambiance.  NOTICE: BMW Individual paints, upholsteries and trims require special consideration. Production of the vehicle could extend build time 6-8 weeks from the time your dealer confirms the order. Please discuss this customized build with your preferred BMW dealer.
byooption.name: BMW Individual Composition

byooption.longDescription: The Luxury Rear Seating Package immerses rear-seat passengers in spa-like levels of comfort. Multi-adjustable rear Comfort seats offer both Active Ventilation and a relaxing massage feature. Using a 7-inch Touch Command Tablet, rear passengers can personalize interior climate, Ambiance lighting, audio, seating and more. The driver is also rewarded with the comfort of a heated steering wheel, while all occupants, front and rear, enjoy three-level heated seats and heated armrests.
byooption.name: Luxury Rear Seating Package

The driver is also rewarded with the comfort of a heated steering wheel, while all occupants, front and rear, enjoy three-level heated seats and heated armrests.
